name: Age of Oil
description:
Basically an idle/strategy game where you play as an early oil baron. Dig deeper to find more oil, but risk your oil wells suffering from a blowout.

In Age of Oil you can:

  • Build oil wells
  • Drill for oil
  • Collect money
  • Upgrade your oil wells
  • Collect even more money
  • Drill deeper
  • Accidentally blowout your oil wells because you drilled too deep
